mapper.insert: insert into article (user_id, title, content, regtime, moditime, thumbnail) values (#{user_id}, #{title}, #{content}, now(), now(), #{thumbnail})
insert into article_file (article_no, user_id, origin_name, saved_name, path) values (#{article_no}, #{user_id}, #{origin_name}, #{saved_name}, #{path})
mapper.select:
select article_no, user_id, title, content, hit, regtime, moditime, thumbnail, (select count(*) from like where like_type = 0 and article_no = no) as like from article
and title like concat('%', #{word}, '%')
and ${key} = #{word}
order by article_no desc
